channel.title: Any help on these errors?
channel.description:
ight i got 100errors lat when i compiled... anyone know how to help me???
^ client.java:5152: class, interface, or enum expected if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) ^ client.java:5157: class, interface, or enum expected person.stillgfx(gfx, person.absY, person.absX); ^ client.java:5158: class, interface, or enum expected if (person.playerLevel[3] - hitDiff < 0) ^ client.java:5160: class, interface, or enum expected person.hitDiff = damage; ^ client.java:5161: class, interface, or enum expected person.KillerId = playerId; ^ client.java:5162: class, interface, or enum expected person.updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:5163: class, interface, or enum expected person.hitUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:5164: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5170: class, interface, or enum expected public void attackNPCSWithin(int gfx, int maxDamage, int range) { ^ client.java:5171: class, interface, or enum expected for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) ^ client.java:5171: class, interface, or enum expected for (int i = 0; i <= server.npcHandler.maxNPCs; i++) ^ client.java:5178: class, interface, or enum expected stillgfx(gfx, server.npcHandler.npcs[i].absY, server.npcHandler.npcs[i]. absX); ^ client.java:5179: class, interface, or enum expected if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i].HP - hitDiff < 0) ^ client.java:5181: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].StartKilling = playerId; ^ client.java:5182: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].RandomWalk = false; ^ client.java:5183: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsUnderAttack = true; ^ client.java:5184: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].hitDiff = damage; ^ client.java:5185: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:5186: class, interface, or enum expected server.npcHandler.npcs[i].hitUpdateRequired = true; ^ client.java:5187: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5192: class, interface, or enum expected public void playerGfx(int id, int delay) { ^ client.java:5194: class, interface, or enum expected mask100var2 = delay; ^ client.java:5195: class, interface, or enum expected mask100update = true; ^ client.java:5196: class, interface, or enum expected updateRequired = true; ^ client.java:5197: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5199: class, interface, or enum expected public void stillgfxz(int id, int Y, int X, int height, int time) ^ client.java:5206: class, interface, or enum expected if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) ^ client.java:5211: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5216: class, interface, or enum expected public void stillgfxz2(int id, int Y, int X, int height, int time) ^ client.java:5219: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(Y - (mapRegionY * 8)); ^ client.java:5220: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(X - (mapRegionX * 8)); ^ client.java:5221: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.createFrame(4); ^ client.java:5222: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7) ^ client.java:5223: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id ^ client.java:5224: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(height);//height of the spell above it's basic place, i thin k it's written in pixels 100 pixels higher ^ client.java:5225: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(time);//Time before casting the graphic ^ client.java:5226: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5228: class, interface, or enum expected public void stillgfx(int id, int Y, int X) ^ client.java:5235: class, interface, or enum expected if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) ^ client.java:5240: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5245: class, interface, or enum expected public void stillgfx2(int id, int Y, int X) ^ client.java:5248: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(Y - (mapRegionY * 8)); ^ client.java:5249: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByteC(X - (mapRegionX * 8)); ^ client.java:5250: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.createFrame(4); ^ client.java:5251: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(0);//Tiles away (X >> 4 + Y & 7) ^ client.java:5252: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(id);//Graphic id ^ client.java:5253: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeByte(0);//height of the spell above it's basic place, i think it' s written in pixels 100 pixels higher ^ client.java:5254: class, interface, or enum expected outStream.writeWord(0);//Time before casting the graphic ^ client.java:5255: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5257: class, interface, or enum expected public void multiTargetGfx(int id, int targetY, int targetX) { ^ client.java:5261: class, interface, or enum expected if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")) ^ client.java:5266: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5274: class, interface, or enum expected public int MageAttackIndex = -1; ^ client.java:5275: class, interface, or enum expected public int graphicstimer = 0; ^ client.java:5276: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean cast = false; ^ client.java:5277: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean fired = false; ^ client.java:5278: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean firingspell = false; ^ client.java:5280: class, interface, or enum expected public int fcastid = 0; ^ client.java:5281: class, interface, or enum expected public int fcasterY = 0; ^ client.java:5282: class, interface, or enum expected public int fcasterX = 0; ^ client.java:5283: class, interface, or enum expected public int foffsetY = 0; ^ client.java:5284: class, interface, or enum expected public int foffsetX = 0; ^ client.java:5285: class, interface, or enum expected public int fangle = 0; ^ client.java:5286: class, interface, or enum expected public int fspeed = 0; ^ client.java:5287: class, interface, or enum expected public int fmgfxid = 0; ^ client.java:5288: class, interface, or enum expected public int fsh = 0; ^ client.java:5289: class, interface, or enum expected public int feh = 0; ^ client.java:5290: class, interface, or enum expected public int ffinishid = 0; ^ client.java:5291: class, interface, or enum expected public int fenemyY = 0; ^ client.java:5292: class, interface, or enum expected public int fenemyX = 0; ^ client.java:5293: class, interface, or enum expected public int fLockon = 0; ^ client.java:5294: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean fMageNpc = false; ^ client.java:5296: class, interface, or enum expected public boolean firespell(int castID, int casterY, int casterX, int offsetY, int offsetX, int angle, int speed, int movegfxID,int startHeight, int endHeight, int finishID, int enemyY,int enemyX, int Lockon) ^ client.java:5299: class, interface, or enum expected fcasterY = casterY; ^ client.java:5300: class, interface, or enum expected fcasterX = casterX; ^ client.java:5301: class, interface, or enum expected foffsetY = offsetY; ^ client.java:5302: class, interface, or enum expected foffsetX = offsetX; ^ client.java:5303: class, interface, or enum expected fangle = angle; ^ client.java:5304: class, interface, or enum expected fspeed = speed; ^ client.java:5305: class, interface, or enum expected fmgfxid = movegfxID; ^ client.java:5306: class, interface, or enum expected fsh = startHeight; ^ client.java:5307: class, interface, or enum expected feh = endHeight; ^ client.java:5308: class, interface, or enum expected ffinishid = finishID; ^ client.java:5309: class, interface, or enum expected fenemyY = enemyY; ^ client.java:5310: class, interface, or enum expected fenemyX = enemyX; ^ client.java:5311: class, interface, or enum expected fLockon = Lockon; ^ client.java:5313: class, interface, or enum expected actionTimer = 0; ^ client.java:5316: class, interface, or enum expected if(cast == false && actionTimer <= 0) { ^ client.java:5318: class, interface, or enum expected cast = true; ^ client.java:5319: class, interface, or enum expected firingspell = true; ^ client.java:5320: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5324: class, interface, or enum expected fired = true; ^ client.java:5325: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5329: class, interface, or enum expected resetGFX(castID, enemyX, enemyY); ^ client.java:5330: class, interface, or enum expected return false; ^ client.java:5331: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ client.java:5333: class, interface, or enum expected } ^ 100 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Any help on these errors?
item.dc:creator: @ricky_james ricky james
item.description:
@ricky_james wrote:

check ur back up and check ur edit its in ur client.java and please take sometime to look over the rules no double posting plz

Read full topic
